# drawBackground(in:)

**Instance Method**

Draws the background of the row in the rectangle.

## Declaration

```swift
@MainActor func drawBackground(in dirtyRect: NSRect)
```

## Parameters

- **dirtyRect**: The rectangle that requires drawing.

## Discussion

Overriding this method allows an application to draw a custom background for a table row view.

By default, this method draws the background color or group row style as appropriate for the row. This method also draws the “below look” for a drop target if [doc://com.apple.appkit/documentation/AppKit/NSTableRowView/isTargetForDropOperation] is [doc://com.apple.documentation/documentation/Swift/true].

## Overriding Row View Display Characteristics

- **backgroundColor**: The background color of the row.
- **drawDraggingDestinationFeedback(in:)**: Draws the row’s dragging destination feedback when the entire row is a drop target.
- **drawSelection(in:)**: Draws the selected row.
- **drawSeparator(in:)**: Draws the horizontal separator between table rows.
